entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AndroidAttachDebugger=true causes app to crash, but AndroidAttachDebugger=false doesn't. #22979
  • Propagate Measured Changed calls up the xplat hierarchy #22978
    9.0-preview7
  • XAMLC error in .NET 9 Preview 5 #22975
  • [Windows] Window Memory Leak #22973
  • Win platform WebView cannot be release after its parent window get close #22972
  • Voice over is not announcing the status message as result found when results are found and visible status message when result is not fond for search recipe edit filed : A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_Search box_screen reader #22971
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Autofac.Core.DependencyResolutionException Error in .Net Maui Blazor. #22970
  • Resize, when 200% Zoomed Items present under ingredients section are getting truncated: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes Recipe_Recipe Screen_Resize. #22969
    Backlog
  • Talkback is not announcing Recipes as Headings: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Screen reader. #22968
    Backlog
  • after switching to 9.0.0.0-preview410690 project won't build #22967
  • [MAUI]Clicking on the page will trigger opening the page twice and you must return twice before you can return to the original page #22966
  • Searchbar Icon Color #22963
  • Control type is not given for recipes appear in collection after searching for recipe: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Recipes Search_Recipe Screen_AI4MAC #22962
    .NET 8 SR8
  • [MacOS] Entry Causing UIView to apply SafeAreaInsets during focus #22960

Closed

  • MacCatalyst build on mac results in "Unknown Scheme", but iOS build working fine. #22942
  • Page-level implicit style can't be derived from Global implicit styles #22961
  • Enumerating contacts retrieved by GetAllAsync traps #22957
  • Android platform throws exception when loading image from HTTPS source. #22147
  • [iOS] - Wrong Layouting in HorizontalStackLayout when WidthRequest in child element is not set #17475

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary SendAppearing call #22959
    area-navigation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [tests] Try a newer xunit #22860
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Update the WebAuth code to support Mac Catalyst #22739
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials
  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, Under Consideration
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
    area-core-platform
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-theme
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-core-platform
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area-xaml
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix TapGestureRecognizer disregards parent's IsEnabled status #22578
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Android pan fixes #21547
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
